title: Option to Customize From Address is not always available
content:
I just upgraded to v115.5.0

When I compose an email message, I can select the "Customize From Address..." on the menu for the from address. If I reply to a message that was sent to an existing identity, I have the option to "Customize From Address..." on the menu for the from address. When I reply to a message sent to one of my extended email addresses, the option to "Customize From Address..." is on the menu, but disabled. Prior to version 115.5.0 this worked and I was able to customize the from address when replying to a message sent to an email address that did not match an existing identity. I use extended email addressing, so I need the option to customize the from address -- is there some way to enable this option again?
creator: moseley-mozilla

title: message from Thunderbird when trying to access account "may have too many cached connections, use IMAP Advanced Settings to reduce cached
content:
After clicking the Thunderbird to enter my email the whole system goes through connecte3d to uepat624@gmail.com then up comes a message from Thunderbird indicating "you may have too many cached connections use IMAP Advanced Settings to reduce cached connections" Then things continue on for probably 5 to 10 mins. sending login info, looking up IMAP, checking mail server capabilities, looking for folders, sending login, opening folder box, downloading

Eventually email inbox and messages come up. I can send, receive and send mass mailings but when you read a message and want to go back to the inbox you have to scroll all the little boxes at the top of the screen back to the one that says "inbox".

I need someone to remove the cached connections. Pat Blackburn
creator: uepat624

title: Recover deleted emails from thunderbird
content: I recently deleted emails from my I pad which has also removed them from my pc. I need to recover them please
